name: UK Pro-Innovation AI Regulation
description: Principles-based, sector-specific approach to AI regulation that empowers existing regulators to apply cross-cutting AI principles within their domains. Emphasizes pro-innovation stance with proportionate regulation.

costs.cost_source: DSIT White Paper 2023, Â£10M regulator budget

embedding_text: UK Pro-Innovation AI Regulation. Principles-based sector-specific approach. Existing regulators apply cross-cutting AI principles. Safety security robustness. Transparency explainability. Fairness. Accountability governance. Contestability redress. Healthcare, finance, education, transport, energy. Pro-innovation proportionate regulation.
